sentences.en: None smiled; but all were sore perplexed, and looked one to the other in deep tribulation for counsel.
sentences.cn: 没有人笑；可众人都不知所措，他们彼此对望，为了急于出主意而苦恼。

sentences.en: I expressed my commiserations on his tribulation.
sentences.cn: 我对他的磨难表示同情。

sentences.en: Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;
sentences.cn: 在指望中要喜乐。 在患难中要忍耐。
